comments.text:
Created attachment 557038
firefox 6.0 build 8 30 11 johnwerneken.txt

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET4.0C; MS-RTC EA 2; AskTB5.6; MS STORE DMC2.6.3411.2)

Steps to reproduce:

Played facebook game 'glory of rome' from Kabam with all tabs as would fit on tab bar open. used 5 tabs for different player roles on different "worlds" in this game. One tab would not load fully nor would it refresh. A common experience; normally clear browser cache addresses this. This time it did not and browser restart computer cold reboot did not help either. 


Actual results:

I suspect a combination of ISP slowness facebook slowness Kabam slowness Lots of firefox tabs AND lots of keyboard and mouse input in this game, some or all of these conditions (which I'm not sure have ever before existed simultaneously) may be cause.

Solution: close browser, find and delete file called media_cache


Expected results:

clear cache in browser should have worked
